content: @David deRoode I saw on the track Confluence page there is an afternoon touch base listed from 3:30pm - 4:00pm. Is this session already over, or is it taking place somewhere other than the Whova stream?

Hi @Michael O'Hanlon sorry you missed us; yes, the group was able to wrap up a little earlier than planned this afternoon. I have a conflicting work call for the rest of this hour, but am free after that, and happy to open the session back up to chat with you this evening. Also, we'll resume tomorrow morning at 10a EST, if you'd like to join us then.
